# Fierce Fortitude (Ex)
## Overview
*Fierce Fortitude (Ex)*: The character gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against diseases and poison. A skald must be trained in [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 114
